name: (T)Racer
description:
Mr. NASCAR, an offroad racer, has dedicated his entire life to offroad racing. It has been his lifelong dream to become the offroad racing champion, but just when he was about to realize his lifelong dream, strange geomagnetic distortions appeared on the race track, dragging him into an alternate timeline where time appears to be looping. And just like that, in an instant, the race of his life has now turned into a race for his life. Will he be able to make it out alive? Let's find out......

CONTROLS:

Type the words correctly to move the car forward. Make sure to get all of them right!!!
